song.title: Onward Ride (K-line Logic Pro X Remake)
song.info:
If you are familiar with the demoscene (especially on the PC side during the 90s) you have probably heard this tune a thousand times because of its awesomeness.
I decided to try recreating it in Logic Pro X with some soft synths. Enjoy!
Credits:
The original tune was composed by Jugi Kaartinen and was released in the demo "Dope" by Complex at TG95.
